ModMetaData.name: Substance Abuse
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds 10 drinkable alcoholic beverages to the game. Each has their own effect when consumed [h1]Features:[/h1]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/mEf1bqw.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/X3kev3B.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/dJldju3.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/yoRtoCP.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/cRK4r37.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/LTum2Df.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/jklu5eM.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/YSVf4Wx.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/zDUMNs5.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/sfui62x.png[/img]
Commissioned for "ParaNautic#7464" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
[h1]Credits:[/h1] - Starsector series - SirHartley- Substance.Abuse 1.0.k - Consumable Alcohol mod - JangoDsoul- Art and XML coder
